verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: prefer] [ARG1: not to clutter my kitchen with extra appliances] but cuisinart new 80 hybrid grill is an exception to my rule cuisinart newest grill the griddler five has proven to be an easy - to - operate and versatile device that i plan on using over and over again to cook breakfast dinner and everything in between panini press cuisinart griddle
